params.name: username
params.desc: The Keystore user that controls the X-Chain account specified in `to`

params.name: password
params.desc: The password of the Keystore user

params.name: sendOutputJsonFile
params.desc: Path to JSON file containing the array of SendOutputs

params.name: from
params.desc: An array of addresses managed by the node's keystore for this blockchain which will fund this transaction

params.name: changeAddr
params.desc: An address to send the change

params.name: memo
params.desc: String which contains arbitrary bytes, up to 256 bytes

name: sendMultiple
desc: Sends an amount of assetID to an array of specified addresses from a list of owned of addresses.
